name: Ember SeeSaw
description:
Embers live deep underground lighting dark caverns, but Little Ember wants to see the surface world, Little Ember wants to fly high into the sky.

A Casual one-thumb-game where you rock the see-saw back and forth to launch Ember as high as you can. Beware of falling hail which can give Ember a bad headache or snuff him out.
For a real challenge activate the hardcore mode where the training wheels (reflector walls on the sides) are removed and heavy hail pummels the area.
